This is a very good first person shooter game overall from multiple games out there! Everything is fair, you just have to know things to be good in general.. However, matchmaking is unfair as sometimes we may get Master Guardian or Gold 4 while we are SEM, and its not fair. And smurfs are extreamly common... Anti-cheat doesn't even detect Anti-Aim / Spinbot.
